analysis.key_quote: This rule change should not have been considered, it is in violation with existing law including the Pendleton Civil Service Reform Act which made the merit based system, and 5 USC 2301 (b) (8) which prevents political influence in federal employee hiring and firing.
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the rule by citing legal violations and concerns about the merit-based system and political influence, indicating a strong stance against the proposed changes.
